tasks.title: Research and summarize best practices for AI agent memory systems
tasks.description:
Find 3-5 authoritative sources on long-term memory for AI agents. Create a summary document with key patterns, approaches, and recommendations.

**Deliverable:** Markdown file with findings and actionable recommendations.

subtasks.title: Search for research papers and articles on AI agent memory
Read and extract key insights from 3-5 sources

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: ✅ Heartbeat detected task and moved to In Progress. Starting research on AI agent memory systems.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text:
✅ Research complete! Created comprehensive summary at docs/ai-memory-best-practices.md

Key findings:
- 3 memory forms: token-level, parametric, latent
- 3-stage pipeline: extraction → consolidation → retrieval
- Best practice: semantic understanding > keyword matching
- AWS AgentCore provides production reference architecture
- 5 authoritative sources cited (ArXiv, AWS, GitHub)

Moving to Review for approval.
